pr_title: Add a way to create Music Discs without requiring a SoundEvent

timeline.message:
Fix OGG file corruption

I actually have no idea why or how, but... no OGG file no test mod so...

Signed-off-by: TheSilkMiner <thesilkminer@outlook.com>

timeline.bodyText:
This is just ugly, Just have
 private static final RegisteryObject<SoundEvent> TEST_SOUND = ... 
 private static final RegistryObject<Item> TEST_DISC = ...

At the top
timeline.author: LexManos

timeline.message:

and use the item it has already
